Module mesakit.map.geography
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.geography.shape.polyline

Class PolylineSnapper

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.map.geography.shape.polyline.PolylineSnapper
public class PolylineSnapper extends Object
Snaps a point to a polyline (or list of points defining a list of segments)

      Snap a point to a polyline

    • snap

      public PolylineSnap snap​(LocationSequence polyline, Location point, Heading headingAtPoint)
      Snap a point to a polyline
      Parameters:
      polyline - The list of locations forming a polyline
      point - The source point to snap
      headingAtPoint - The heading of the point to help with disambiguation
      Returns:
      The point snapped to the polyline
